laptops.name: MacBook Pro

laptops.name: HP Spectre x360
laptops.description: HP laptop with 13.3-inch OLED display, 11th Gen Intel Core i7 processor, and 16GB RAM.

tablets.name: iPad Air
tablets.description: Apple tablet with 10.9-inch Retina display, A14 Bionic chip, and 64GB storage.

tablets.name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S7
tablets.description: Samsung tablet with 11-inch Super AMOLED display, Snapdragon 865+ processor, and 128GB storage.

tablets.name: Microsoft Surface Pro 7
tablets.description: Microsoft tablet with 12.3-inch PixelSense display, 10th Gen Intel Core i5 processor, and 128GB storage.

smartphones.description: Apple smartphone with 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, A15 Bionic chip, and 128GB storage.

smartphones.name: Samsung Galaxy S21
smartphones.description: Samsung smartphone with 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, Exynos 2100 processor, and 128GB storage.

smartphones.name: Google Pixel 6
smartphones.description: Google smartphone with 6.4-inch AMOLED display, Google Tensor processor, and 128GB storage.

gaming.name: PlayStation 5
gaming.description: Sony gaming console with 825GB SSD, AMD Zen 2 processor, and Ray Tracing.

gaming.name: Xbox Series X
gaming.description: Microsoft gaming console with 1TB SSD, AMD Zen 2 processor, and Ray Tracing.

gaming.name: Nintendo Switch OLED
gaming.description: Nintendo gaming console with OLED display, improved audio, and new dock.

books.title: The Lord of the Rings
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: A fantasy novel set in the fictional world of Middle-earth, following hobbit Frodo Baggins as he and the Fellowship embark on a quest to destroy the One Ring.

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A novel set in the American South during the Great Depression, exploring themes of racism, injustice, and loss of innocence.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society, following protagonist Winston Smith as he rebels against the oppressive regime.

pc.title: Dell XPS 13
pc.description: A high-end ultrabook with a 13-inch display, Intel Core i7 processor, 16 GB RAM, and 1 TB SSD storage.

pc.title: HP Pavilion Gaming Desktop
pc.description: A mid-range gaming PC with AMD Ryzen 5 processor, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 graphics card, 8 GB RAM, and 256 GB SSD storage.

pc.title: Apple iMac 27-inch
pc.description: A high-end all-in-one desktop with 27-inch 5K Retina display, Intel Core i9 processor, 32 GB RAM, and 1 TB SSD storage.

peripherals.title: Logitech MX Master 3 Wireless Mouse
peripherals.description: A high-end wireless mouse with advanced features such as customizability, gesture controls, and fast scrolling.

peripherals.title: Corsair K95 RGB Platinum XT Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
peripherals.description: A high-end mechanical gaming keyboard with customizable RGB lighting, Cherry MX Speed switches, and dedicated macro keys.

peripherals.title: Dell Ultrasharp U2720Q 27-inch 4K Monitor
peripherals.description: A high-end 27-inch 4K monitor with USB-C connectivity, DisplayHDR 400 certification, and color accuracy for professional use.

software.title: Adobe Creative Cloud Photography Plan
software.description: A subscription plan that includes Lightroom, Photoshop, and 20GB of cloud storage for professional photo editing and organization.

software.title: Microsoft Office Home & Student 2021
software.description: A one-time purchase that includes Word, Excel, and PowerPoint for personal and educational use.

software.title: Norton 360 Deluxe Antivirus
software.description: A comprehensive antivirus and security suite that includes VPN, dark web monitoring, and password manager.

tv.title: LG OLED55CXPUA 4K Smart OLED TV
tv.description: A 55-inch OLED TV with 4K resolution, Dolby Vision IQ, and NVIDIA G-Sync compatibility for immersive gaming.

tv.title: Samsung QN65Q80AAFXZA 4K Smart QLED TV
tv.description: A 65-inch QLED TV with 4K resolution, Quantum HDR 12X, and Object Tracking Sound+ for cinematic audio experience.

tv.title: Sony XBR-55A9G 4K Smart OLED TV
tv.description: A 55-inch OLED TV with 4K resolution, X1 Ultimate processor, and Acoustic Surface Audio+ for lifelike sound.

audio-video.title: Sonos One (Gen 2) - Voice Controlled Smart Speaker
audio-video.description: A compact smart speaker with built-in Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant, and high-quality audio performance.

audio-video.title: JBL Xtreme 2 Waterproof Portable Bluetooth Speaker
audio-video.description: A rugged and waterproof portable speaker with powerful bass and up to 15 hours of playtime.

audio-video.title: Bose QuietComfort 35 II Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
audio-video.description: Noise-cancelling headphones with Alexa voice control, up to 20 hours of battery life, and a comfortable over-ear design.

photo.title: Canon EOS R Mirrorless Digital Camera
photo.description: A full-frame mirrorless camera with a 30.3MP CMOS sensor, 4K video, and advanced autofocus system.

photo.title: DJI Mavic Air 2 Fly More Combo
photo.description: A compact and foldable drone with a 4K camera, 3-axis gimbal, and up to 34 minutes of flight time.

photo.title: Fujifilm Instax Mini 11 Instant Camera
photo.description: A fun and compact instant camera with automatic exposure and a built-in selfie mirror.
